analysepast.title: Analyse Past Roll Call Data
analysepast.description: Upload multiple CSV files from past roll calls to analyze attendance patterns and trends using AI.

chat.title: AI Analysis Assistant
chat.welcome:
Welcome! Upload multiple CSV files from your past roll calls to analyze attendance patterns. I can help identify trends, member engagement patterns, late arrivals (benchmark: 9:45am), and provide insights.

**February 2025 Demo Summary:**
• Feb 2: 167 members, 111 present (66.5%)
• Feb 9: 167 members, 111 present (66.5%)
• Feb 16: 172 members, 102 present (59.3%)
• Feb 23: 176 members, 101 present (57.4%)

**Key Insights:** Attendance decreased from 66.5% to 57.4% by month end. Member list grew from 167 to 176. Late arrival analysis uses 9:45am HKT as the benchmark for Sunday service punctuality.
